edu.usc.anrg.vsim.discrete.manager
Class StorageManager.NodeStorageManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.usc.anrg.vsim.discrete.manager.StorageManager.NodeStorageManager
Enclosing class:
StorageManager
public class StorageManager.NodeStorageManager
extends java.lang.Object

A class that manages the storage for a single node. The fileManager is used to manage the files of this node. It is a HashMap, which maps a file to its corresponding File object.

Author:
Maheswaran Sathiamoorthy
